text.author: Pashley, Wrh2Bot, Ikan Kekek and others (see URL)
text.title: Coron
text.summary: This overview of the history of Coron, a fishing town on the island of Busuanga in the Philippines, tells about the local people (Tagbanuas), the shift from farming to mining, fishing, and more recently tourism, and attractions such as stunning lakes, snorkeling, and wreck diving to see around ten Japanese ships sunk by the US Navy in World War II.
